entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
